amendment.description: To repeal TSA's exemption from Federal procurement law.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4552 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4552 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Kerry. (consideration: CR S7387; text: CR S7387) To repeal TSA's exemption from Federal procurement law.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4552 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4552 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Kerry.
